SEARCH
Package com.example.summit.model

Class Firebase

java.lang.Object
com.example.summit.model.Firebase
public class Firebase extends Object
A utility class for handling interactions with the Firebase Firestore database.

This class provides static methods for common database operations such as saving users (Entrants, Organizers) and loading event data. It encapsulates the FirebaseFirestore instance to provide a simple API for the rest of the application.

  • Method Details

    • saveEntrant

      public static void saveEntrant(Entrant entrant)
      Saves or updates an Entrant object in the 'entrants' collection in Firestore.

      The entrant's device ID is used as the unique document ID in Firestore. Logs success or failure to the console.

      Parameters:
      entrant - The Entrant object to be saved.

    • saveOrganizer

      public static void saveOrganizer(Organizer organizer)
      Saves or updates an Organizer object in the 'organizers' collection in Firestore.

      The organizer's device ID is used as the unique document ID in Firestore. Logs success or failure to the console.

      Parameters:
      organizer - The Organizer object to be saved.

    • saveAdmin

      public static void saveAdmin(Admin admin)
      Saves or updates an Admin object in the 'admins' collection in Firestore.

      The admin's device ID is used as the unique document ID in Firestore. Logs success or failure to the console.

      Parameters:
      admin - The Admin object to be saved.

      public static void updateWaitingList(WaitingList list)

      public void saveEvent(Event event)

      public static void deleteEvent(Event event)

    • loadEvents

      public static void loadEvents(EventLoadCallback callback)
      Asynchronously loads all event descriptions from the 'events' collection in Firestore.

      On a successful retrieval, it deserializes each document into an EventDescription object and passes the resulting list to the provided callback. On failure, it logs an error.

      Parameters:
      callback - The EventLoadCallback to be invoked with the list of EventDescription objects on success, or to handle the error.

    • deleteEvent

      public static void deleteEvent(String eventId, DeleteCallback callback)
      Deletes a single event and its associated QR code from Firestore.

      This method deletes the event document from the 'events' collection and the corresponding QR code from the 'qrcodes' collection. Uses the provided DeleteCallback to notify success or failure.

      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to delete.
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • deleteEvents

      public static void deleteEvents(List<String> eventIds, DeleteCallback callback)
      Deletes multiple events and their associated QR codes from Firestore.

      Iterates through the list of event IDs and deletes each event document from the 'events' collection and its corresponding QR code from the 'qrcodes' collection. It tracks the deletion progress and invokes the callback when all deletions are complete or if an error occurs.

      Parameters:
      eventIds - The list of event IDs to delete.
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • loadAllUsersRealtime

      public static void loadAllUsersRealtime(UserLoadCallback callback)
      Loads all users from Firestore with real-time updates using SnapshotListeners.

      This method sets up three separate SnapshotListeners on the 'entrants', 'organizers', and 'admins' collections. The listeners merge results into a unified list of UserProfile objects and notify the callback whenever any collection changes.

      Parameters:
      callback - The callback to handle loaded users or errors

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(UserProfile userProfile, DeleteCallback callback)
      Deletes a single user from the appropriate Firestore collection based on their role.
      Parameters:
      userProfile - The UserProfile containing the user to delete
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure

    • deleteUsers

      public static void deleteUsers(List<UserProfile> userProfiles, DeleteCallback callback)
      Deletes multiple users from their respective Firestore collections.

      This method deletes users based on their roles, routing each deletion to the appropriate collection ('entrants', 'organizers', or 'admins'). It tracks deletion progress and invokes the callback when all deletions are complete or if errors occur.

      Parameters:
      userProfiles - List of UserProfiles to delete
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure

    • loadAllEventPosters

      public static void loadAllEventPosters(EventPosterLoadCallback callback)
      Loads all event posters with associated organizer names from Firestore. Only includes events that have posterBase64 data.

      This method fetches events from the 'events' collection and joins them with organizer data from the 'organizers' collection to create EventPoster objects.

      Parameters:
      callback - Callback invoked with list of EventPoster objects or error

    • deleteEventPoster

      public static void deleteEventPoster(String eventId, ImageDeleteCallback callback)
      Deletes an event's poster by removing the posterBase64 field from Firestore. Does not delete the entire event, only the image data.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event whose poster should be deleted
      callback - Callback invoked on success or failure

    • loadAllOrganizersRealtime

      public static void loadAllOrganizersRealtime(OrganizerLoadCallback callback)
      Loads all organizers with real-time updates.

    • loadOrganizerEventIds

      public static void loadOrganizerEventIds(String organizerId, EventIdsCallback callback)
      Loads event IDs for a specific organizer.

    • loadNotificationsForEvents

      public static void loadNotificationsForEvents(List<String> eventIds, NotificationLogCallback callback)
      Loads notifications for specific events with batching support.

    • deleteNotification

      public static void deleteNotification(String notificationId, DeleteCallback callback)
      Deletes a notification from Firestore.

    • updateNotificationMessage

      public static void updateNotificationMessage(String notificationId, String newMessage, DeleteCallback callback)
      Updates a notification's message.
